metrics.name: Impressions
metrics.description: Number of impressions on in-app or onsite promotions or Extole-sent emails that have been opened (does not include links posted on social channels or untracked sources)

metrics.name: Promotion Click-Throughs
metrics.description: Number of clicks on in-app promotions, onsite promotions, email promotions, or promotion links posted on social channels

metrics.name: Promotion Click-Through Rate
metrics.description: (Promotion clicks/Impressions) * 100. Promotion Click-Through Rate is the ratio of clicks on promotions to impressions on promotions (Impressions does not include links posted on social channels or untracked sources).

metrics.name: Shares
metrics.description: Number of shares

metrics.name: Share Rate
metrics.description: (Shares/Share experience views) * 100. Share Rate is the ratio of shares to share experience views.

metrics.name: Highest Quality Shares
metrics.description: Number of shares that are highest quality

metrics.name: Advocations
metrics.description: Behaviors that indicate brand-building activities, such as sharing or referring

metrics.name: Email Opens
metrics.description: Number of views of share emails

metrics.name: Highest Quality Email Opens
metrics.description: Number of views of share emails that are highest quality

metrics.name: Share Clicks
metrics.description: Number of clicks on share links

metrics.name: Share Click-Through Rate
metrics.description: (Share clicks/Shares) * 100. Share Click-Through Rate is the ratio of clicks on share links to shares.

metrics.name: Highest Quality Share Clicks
metrics.description: Number of clicks on share links that are highest quality

metrics.name: Rewarded Share Clicks
metrics.description: Number of clicks on share links that have resulted in a friend reward

metrics.name: Highest Quality Share-Through Rate
metrics.description: (Highest quality share clicks/Highest quality shares) * 100. Highest Quality Share Click-Through Rate is the ratio of highest quality clicks on share links to highest quality shares.

metrics.name: Share Click Reward Rate
metrics.description: (Rewarded share clicks/Share clicks) * 100. Share Click Reward Rate is the ratio clicks on share links that have resulted in a friend reward to total clicks on share links.

metrics.name: Friend Visits
metrics.description: Number of visits to a share destination

metrics.name: Friend Rewards
metrics.description: Number of rewards issued to friends

metrics.name: Signups
metrics.description: Number of signups

metrics.name: Signup Rate
metrics.description: (Signups/Share clicks) * 100. Signup Rate is the ratio of signups to clicks on share links.

metrics.name: New to File Signups
metrics.description: Number of signups that are new to your customer list

metrics.name: Rewarded Signups
metrics.description: Number of signups that have resulted in a friend reward

metrics.name: Highest Quality Signup Rate
metrics.description: (Highest quality signups/Highest quality share clicks) * 100. Highest Quality Signup Rate is the ratio of highest quality signups to highest quality clicks on share links.

metrics.name: New to File Signup Rate
metrics.description: (New to file signups/Share clicks) * 100. New to File Signup Rate is the ratio of new to file signups to clicks on share links.

metrics.name: Signup Reward Rate
metrics.description: (Rewarded signups/Signups) * 100. Signup Reward Rate is the ratio of signups that have resulted in a friend reward to total signups.

metrics.name: Advocate Rewarded Signups
metrics.description: Number of signups that have resulted in an advocate reward

metrics.name: Advocate Signup Reward Rate
metrics.description: (Advocate rewarded signups/Signups) * 100. Advocate Signup Reward Rate is the ratio of signups that have resulted in an advocate reward to total signups.

metrics.name: Highest Quality Signups
metrics.description: Number of highest quality signups

metrics.name: Conversions
metrics.description: Number of conversions

metrics.name: Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (Conversions/Share clicks) * 100. Conversion Rate is the ratio of conversions to clicks on share links.

metrics.name: Highest Quality Conversions
metrics.description: Number of highest quality conversions

metrics.name: New to File Friend Conversions
metrics.description: Number of conversions that are new to your customer list

metrics.name: Rewarded Friend Conversions
metrics.description: Number of friend conversions that have resulted in an advocate reward

metrics.name: Value of Rewarded Conversions
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all conversions that have resulted in an advocate reward

metrics.name: Highest Quality Friend Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (Highest quality friend conversions/Highest quality share clicks) * 100. Highest Quality Friend Conversion Rate is the ratio of friend conversions that are highest quality to clicks on share links that are highest quality.

metrics.name: New to File Friend Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (New to file friend conversions/Share clicks) * 100. New to File Friend Conversion Rate is the ratio of friend conversions that are new to file to clicks on share links.

metrics.name: Friend Conversion Reward Rate
metrics.description: (Rewarded conversions/Conversions) * 100. Conversion Reward Rate is the ratio of conversions that have resulted in an advocate reward to total conversions.

metrics.name: Conversion Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from conversions

metrics.name: New to File Conversion Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all conversions that are new to your customer list

metrics.name: Highest Quality Friend Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all highest quality conversions

metrics.name: Friend Rewarded Friend Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that resulted in a friend reward

metrics.name: Friend Redeemed Reward Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that used a friend reward

metrics.name: Advocate Rewarded Friend Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that resulted in an advocate reward

metrics.name: Advocate Redeemed Reward Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that used an advocate reward

metrics.name: Advocate Rewards
metrics.description: Number of rewards issued to advocates

metrics.name: Shipments
metrics.description: Number of purchases shipped

metrics.name: Shipment Rate
metrics.description: (Shipments/Conversions) * 100. Shipment Rate is the ratio of purchases shipped to conversions.

metrics.name: Returns
metrics.description: Number of purchases returned

metrics.name: Return Rate
metrics.description: (Returns/Shipments) * 100. Return Rate is the ratio of purchases returned to purchases shipped.
